net.sourceforge.cilib.Algorithm
Interface ParticipatingAlgorithm

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoOperativeOptimisationAlgorithm, EA, MultistartOptimisationAlgorithm, PSO
public interface ParticipatingAlgorithm

Any algorithm that implements this interface can be used as a participant in a CoOperativeOptimisationAlgorithm.

Note: Currently this interface only supports continuous domained problems.

Author:
espeer

Method Summary
 double[] getContribution()
          Returns contribution to the solution for the co-operative optimisation algorithm.

          Returns the fitness of contribution to the solution.

          Updates the new fitness for the solution contribution.
